title: Durbin: Department of Education Tightens Controls on ITT Tech (Richard J Durbin)
text: ( Source : Richard J Durbin) 10.19.15 [WASHINGTON, D.C. ] - U.S. Senator Dick Durbin (D-IL) responded today to a move by the Department of Education to tighten controls over ITT Tech after finding that the for-profit college - facing
